text: 16 Hudson is a Canadian animated series. It is developed by Big Bad Boo based on the miniseries Lili and Lola and it has been broadcast by TVOKids since August 21, 2018 and Knowledge Kids since September 3, 2018. It has 39 episodes which are each 7 minutes long. ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Canadian children's animated television series Category:2010s Canadian animated television series Category:TVOntario original programming
title: 16 Hudson
